user_query: I want to analyze MOVR coin and SAND token for investment.

TaskList.description: Fetch the current price and historical data for the MOVR coin to obtain the price difference and percentage change.
Calculate the price difference and percentage change for MOVR based on the data retrieved in Subtask 1.
Fetch the current Ethereum gas fee to understand the fees associated with transactions for MOVR coin.
Fetch the historical price data for the SAND token for the past 1 year and 3 years to analyze the trends.
required_inputs: SAND token price data for 1 year
SAND token price data for 3 years

TaskList.description: Analyze the fetched historical price data for SAND to understand its trends and make an informed decision.
required_inputs: historical price data of SAND for 1 year
historical price data of SAND for 3 years
